Fun Wand

by Matthew Nolan on 07/17/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Anal Toys »
  • Comic »
  • Dildos »
  • Review Comics

Portland is FRYING like an egg. It’s so freakin’ hot, Erika and I don’t even know what to do with ourselves.

Honestly, we have this latex dress that we’re SO EXCITED FOR. But, guys… it’s like 100F inside the house 0_0 So instead, HOT-off the press, a comic on the njoy Fun Wand! A toy sent to us YEARS ago, and one we wrote off as pretty but ineffective. UNTIL NOW.

If you buy it, I hope you like it as much as we did!

Please peruse the links below to learn much, much, much more about this fascinating set of reproductive organs. And also! Take a look back at some of the other comics […]
item.content:encoded:
Vulvovaginal Anatomy

by Erika Moen on 07/10/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Education Comics »
  • Health

There’s SO MUCH INFO to cover on the vulva and vagina areas (Or “vulvovaginal” for short), I wish we had the space to include more! Please peruse the links below to learn much, much, much more about this fascinating set of reproductive organs. And also! Take a look back at some of the other comics Matt and I have done on the subject of genitals: Homologous Genitals, Pelvic Exam, Pregnancy, (A Version of) The Sexual Response Cycle, Penis and Pals, and Foreskin Funsies. In fact, just take a skim through our Sex Education Archives for a buncha delicious comics about the practicalities of your body!

Resources


► Cervical Position: What Your Cervical Position Tells You About Your Fertility
► Innies & Outies: The Vagina, Clitoris, Uterus and More (Scarleteen)
► Give’em Some Lip: Labia That Clearly Ain’t Minor (Scarleteen)
► Vulva, I hardly knew ye (Scarleteen)
► Why are my labia so weird? (Scarleteen)
► My Corona: The Hymen & the Myths That Surround It (Scarleteen)
► Taking Care of Your “Pussy” (Video Series by Planned Parenthood!)
► What are the parts of the female reproductive anatomy? (Planned Parenthood)
► Videos by Laci Green: Are my vulva and vagina normal?, 10 Secret Vagina Facts, Vagina Hacks, Freaky Labia, Does Sex Make You Loose, You Can’t Pop Your Cherry (Hymen 101), Squirting 101

Pictures of Vulvas


► The Vulva Gallery
► The Labia Library
► Betty Dodson’s Vulva Illustrations (Scarleteen)
► I’ll Show You Mine: Laure, Kacey, Odyne, Emily, Diana, Jayla, and Erin (Scarleteen)

Posted In: Blog

Oh HELL YES. Check it out; our good friends at Filthy Figments are making a sexy comic book – and you KNOW we love those!

That author list is a team of pornographic heavyweights, and I think for the $30 its a good bet. So if you’re looking for some good fun porn…


SCORE! An Anthology of Erotic Sports Comics!

Personally, I’m so ready for this, I love me some sexy-sports and I feel like the comics erotic scene has been growing leaps and bounds these past few years. I just so excited about seeing more of it. <3 <3 <3

item.content:encoded:
Gettin’ it On Outside by Amelia Altavena

by Matthew Nolan on 07/03/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Adventures »
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Story Comics

This one’s a fun one! Amelia is a bit of a travel cartoonist, so I was really excited when she brought me a pitch all on having sex outdoors. It’s nice and light with a fun bit of autobio too and should go down nice and easy with your 4th of July celebrations (if you’re celebrating it), we hope you like it!

This week Erika and I are playing catch up (Erikas been a bit out-of-whack recently, and not been able to work as hard as regular!) on the anatomy comic we’ve got planned. Fingers crossed we can get it done in the week, and then… Oh boy, we’ve got a HELL of a review planned =D I’m so excited to get it made for you guys!

In the meantime, go drop Amelia a hello and a follow!

  • Portfolio
  • Tumblr
  • Instagram
  • IRL Adventure IG
└ Tags: adventure, Amelia Altavena, climbing, guest, guest comic, mountain, outdoors, outside

item.content:encoded:
Three’s Company by Natalie Dupille

by Matthew Nolan on 06/12/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Story Comics »
  • Sex & Sexuality

Erika and I did a long weekend in the woods as part of a victory lap/recovery from the Kickstarter. SO GOOD, and SO NEEDED. It’s with great thanks that I share this wonderful comic from Natalie on her non-monogamous life. I hope you all like this slice of autobio and honest comic. Drop her a word of thanks if you can!

  • Portfolio
  • Instagram
  • Tumblr
  • Etsy

Next week, we’re prrrrroooobably gonna have to do another guest comic! Erika took on too many for-friends-projects and needs to get them donnnnzo’s. It’s crazy, but there’s no time to spare with the regular OJST schedule, so if there’s a project Erika REALLY REALLY wants to be a part of – gotta find a guest comic top cover for us! Anyway’s – this is kinda good news you for anyone hoping to BE a guest artist as I’m going to be opening up submissions sometime today and will be accepting new guest comics for the Summer/Autumn.

item.title: Flip 0 Black And Vibrating
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Getting back into the swing of things, and I’ve got a 2 toy review for you guys. When I handed off the Vibrating Flip 0 to a pal, I legit didn’t know it cost $215. We both just assumed it was a fancy model, but not like… royalty fancy. $215 FEELS bonkers! But also, according […]
item.content:encoded:
Flip 0 Black And Vibrating

by Matthew Nolan on 06/05/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Penis Toys »
  • Review Comics

Getting back into the swing of things, and I’ve got a 2 toy review for you guys.

When I handed off the Vibrating Flip 0 to a pal, I legit didn’t know it cost $215. We both just assumed it was a fancy model, but not like… royalty fancy. $215 FEELS bonkers! But also, according to him, FEELS AMAZING. I’m still on the fence – I think you can spend your cash more wisely across products and services.

What I can tell you for certain is that the Flip 0 Black model is by far one of the… (maybe the best?) toys to have graced my donger. It’s a SOLID design. Every aspect thought out and well constructed. And with the harder TPE material, it gives me more noticeable and immediate feelings. I REALLY recommend it, but only when your feeling like you’ve got the cash to spare.

Check out my previous review on the White model here! Anddd if your keen to go digging in the archives, my review of the older Flip HOLE models.

There are now a few different ‘Tenga Flip’ models out there, so the list bellow is links to search pages for ‘Flip’ toys… As of posting the comic it only looks like a few stores (like Shebop and Lovehoney) have the black and vibrating models in stock, but its pretty new, so expect them to show up later on.

item.content:encoded:
Echo

by Matthew Nolan on 05/22/2018 at 12:01 am
  • Comic »
  • Dildos »
  • Review Comics

We’ve had fun looking at Echo in our to-do pile for yonks! So excited to finally get it reviewed and even more EXCITED to have finally found a Bad Dragon toy that works for Erika.

You might remember our previous Bad Drago Reviews. the Sofia sleve, the Flint dildo, the Fenrir dildo and finally the dragon cock extender. Bad dragon make a TON of intersting toys. Give them a peek!

  • Echo
  • Bad Dragon

Today’s comic contains one of our lovely long time reader who picked up a Be a Masturbateer for a Day slot from last year’s book Kickstarter, and they have a phalloplasty! If you’re interested in this, check out their informational blog all about the procedure and their experiences with it here. They even answer reader questions on occasion!

Secondly, there is ONLY a ONE WEEK LEFT on the current Kickstarter! We’ve been bowled over by the support on this. If you want to support us and get a book, check it out while you still can!
